price: (Isaaniin jedhama): “Isheen kun ibidda kan ishee sobsiisaa turtaniidha.
arabic: هَٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: hādhihi al-nāru allatī kuntum bihā tukadhibūna
